      • setFilter

        public SmtpAppender.Builder setFilter(Filter filter)
        Specifies the filter used for this appender. By default, uses a ThresholdFilter with a level of ERROR.
        Overrides:
        setFilter in class AbstractFilterable.Builder<SmtpAppender.Builder>

      • build

        public SmtpAppender build()
        Description copied from interface: Builder
        Builds the object after all configuration has been set. This will use default values for any unspecified attributes for the object.
        Specified by:
        build in interface Builder<SmtpAppender>
        Returns:
        the configured instance.
